trans:
You can check the list of all 82 branches in the picture, along with the details for the release of the product #MoshiMoshixNCTDREAM DREAM()SCAPE as follows:
*Note:
üö®The 1st drop line-up products, with all 18 items, will be available on October 12, 2024, at the following 8 branches: Central WestGate 2nd floor, Central Rama 2 3rd floor, Seacon Srinakarin 2nd floor, Seacon Bangkae B floor, Future Park Rangsit 1st floor, Fashion Island 1st floor, Siam Square One LG floor, Mega Bangna 1st floor, and MBK Center 6th floor. Other branches will also have all items, but some may not have all the items available on the released date, depending on the situation of each branch.
üö®The 2nd drop line-up products will gradually be available at all listed branches, from October 19 onwards.
üö®The sleepwear will be available exclusively through the online channel on SHOPEE : MOSHI MOSHI OFFICIAL STORE only, and will be released in 3 periods as follows:
